item.description:
'gallery talk' at danforth museum (also in framingham) to discuss work of early abstract expressionist and boston native, jason berger. (suggested by judy schneider)

JASON BERGER: Directed Vision

October 24, 2008 - March 1, 2009
Opening Reception Saturday, October 25, 6 - 8 pm
Gallery Talks Wednesday, November 5, noon
___________Sunday, January 25, 3 pm
item.name: Gallery Talk
